entries.description: Labels that can be added to the new created issue.

entries.description:
Feedback link URL.

By default, it's a link to the issue creation form of the docs repository, with the current page title prefilled:
[example](https://github.com/shuding/nextra/issues/new?title=Feedback%20for%20%E2%80%9CTheme%20Configuration%E2%80%9D&labels=feedback).
entries.name: feedback.link

entries.description: Rendered [`<Footer>` component](/docs/docs-theme/built-ins/footer). E.g. `<Footer {...footerProps} />`
entries.name: footer

entries.description: Options to configure the language dropdown for [the i18n docs website](/docs/guide/i18n).

entries.description: Component to render the last updated info.

entries.description: Page map list. Result of `getPageMap(route = '/')` call.
